thread.title: Varun Dhawan a.k.a Badrinath wants you to help him find a suitable Dulhania
thread.title_full: Varun Dhawan a.k.a Badrinath wants you to help him find a suitable Dulhania

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Varun Dhawan a.k.a Badrinath wants you to help him find a suitable Dulhania
text:
Varun Dhawan a.k.a Badrinath wants you to help him find a suitable Dulhania Varun Dhawan a.k.a Badrinath shares his biodata and it will have you in spilts! By Snehal Rajani | Updated: February 8, 2017 9:02 pm From Badrinath Ki Dulhania title song to Jolly LLB 2's Go Pagal: 5 Holi songs which will set you grooving 
Varun Dhawan a.k.a Badri is on a mission to find his Dulhani and therefore he has shared his biodata on his social media account. We all know that Varun is gearing up for his next project Badrinath Ki Dulhania for which the promotions are going on in full swing. The actor has shared his biodata on his Insta feed and he is expecting you to find him his Dulhania. “My bio data for marriage#badrinathkidulhania,” he captioned the pic. The biodata is something that will instantly crack you up. Towards the end, for the partner preference section, it also reads, “Jo humse compound interest ka formula na pooche”. Hahaha. Now this is hilarious! Remember how in the trailer Alia, his Dulhania asks him to tell the mathematical formula for simple interest and compound interest? This is in reference to that! So c’mon all you guys.. wouldn’t you want to help Badrinath find a suitable bride? A photo posted by Varun Dhawan (@varundvn) on Feb 8, 2017 at 4:03am PST 
Just a day ago, the makers released Badrinath Ki Dulhania’s title track and we ought to say, it is an electrifying number. Needless to say, Alia and Varun make a wonderful pair and seeing them onscreen is an absolutely delight. Their chemistry looks superb so let’s hope the film has got something interesting in store for viewers. We saw them last in Student of The Year and Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania and we couldn’t get enough of them. Let’s hope that Badrinath Ki Dulhania leaves the same impression too! (ALSO READ: Badrinath Ki Dulhania title song: Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan’s Holi number is vibrant, colourful and groovy – watch video ) 
As far as promotions are concerned, Alia and Varun are all set to appear on Koffee With Karan 5 and if the promo is anything to go by, this is gonna be one helluva entertainer. Badrinath Ki Dulhania, a Shashank Khaitan film is slated to release on March 10, 2017.
